title: Which are some of the best literary works? - Quora

response.answer_text: Something that makes people forget their world and helps to connect the person with the protagonist and still tend to remain classy is in my opinion the best literary work. Some of the best literary works are : A Christmas Carol by Charles DickensA Midsummer Night’s Dream by William ShakespeareJulius Caesar by William ShakespeareOliver Twist by Charles DickensDavid Copperfield by Charles DickensAnna Karenina by Leo TolstoyTo kill a Mocking Bird by Harper LeeThe Catcher in the Rye by JD SalingerRobinson Crusoe by Daniel DefoeThe Adventures of Tom Sawyer by Mark TwainJane Eyre by Charlotte BrontePride and Prejudice by Jane Austen
